title: Wrongly Accused
overview: Wrongly Accused is a true crime series that looks at both sides of some of the greatest miscarriages of justice in British criminal history. Hosted by Investigative Reporter Louise Shorter, the new series explores cases where lives were destroyed when individuals were wrongly accused of murders they did not commit.Louise will meet the wrongly accused, the family members involved, and those close to the case. Louise and a group of experts will interrogate how the wrongs were corrected from the original trial to put the real killer behind bars.
